remarks: The size of the set of the neighbors of a vertex is the vertex degree of this vertex, analogous to ~ hashnbgravd .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-Dec-2017.)
statement: hashnbgravdg $p |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ U e. V ) -> ( # ` ( <. V , E >. Neighbors U ) ) = ( ( V VDeg E ) ` U ) ) $.
